The plant, which had solar collection area of 4,700 m2 (51,000 sq ft), could produce up to <a4_0>22,700 L (5,000 imp gal; 6,000 US gal) per day<a4_0/> and operate for 40 years. Individual still designs include <a5_0>single-slope<a5_0/>, double-slope (or greenhouse type), vertical, conical, inverted absorber, multi-wick, and multiple effect.
